text:
ChannelMeter | Software Engineer | https://channelmeter.com | San Francisco | ONSITE

We're a small team focused on providing enterprise software for digital media companies and brand advertisers. Specifically we work on operational tools which include - creator/influencer relationship management, payments, video & social analytics, community building and campaign management. Currently our engineering is tiny (2) and we are looking to hire someone who can get comfortable with the entire stack.

Our primary tools are React/Redux, Go, Cassandra, Mesos & Docker.

Email nimi@channelmeter.com
